document.full_text: the official death toll from the devastating earthquake and tsunami that hit japan earlier in the month has now exceeded 9,000, kyodo news agency quoted the national police as saying on tuesday.
document.title: official death toll from japan quake & tsunami tops 9,000: kyodo
lines_and_colors: the official death toll from the devastating earthquake and tsunami that hit japan earlier in the month has now exceeded 9,000, kyodo news agency quoted the national police as saying on tuesday.
